description:
I would say Randall falls into the "Twink" category. He is 19, but in some of these photos he looks down-right young. So if you like 'em youthful (and a bit naughty), then you will love Randall.
Randall grew up with very open-minded parents, spending most of his youth doing nudist colony-type things. This has made him extremely comfortable with his body.
He is straight, but he definitely has some sugar there. He loves playing with his ass, and though that's not necessarily gay, I am thinking he might, for now, be interested in playing for both teams.
Either way, Team Chaos would welcome him with open arms and open legs!
His solo is very hot as he totally gets off being watched by you all and certainly loves fingering himself while doing it.
title: Randall - Solo
